sentences.from_sentence: Full-Stack coder with a strong focus on frontend technologies, proficient in Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL, creating scalable and efficient applications.
sentences.to_sentence: Full Stack Developer with expertise in building robust and scalable web and mobile applications, experienced in both frontend and backend systems.

sentences.from_sentence: Skilled in developing responsive and user-centric front-end interfaces using React.js and React Native, with strong version control practices using Git for seamless collaboration.
sentences.to_sentence: Proficient in Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL, with strong experience in frontend frameworks including React.js and Next.js, and familiarity with Angular and Vue.js.

sentences.from_sentence: Engineered an innovative solution that combines machine learning, web scraping, and cloud computing to deliver real-time insights and comparisons, enhancing user decision-making experiences.
sentences.to_sentence: Skilled at designing and maintaining scalable server-side logic, integrating RESTful APIs and third-party services, while ensuring performance, quality, and responsiveness.

sentences.from_sentence: Proficient in deploying applications on cloud platform like AWS, utilizing serverless architecture and microservices to optimize performance and reduce costs.
sentences.to_sentence: Experienced in deploying applications on cloud platforms, integrating SQL and NoSQL databases such as MongoDB, and writing Python scripts for backend automation.

sentences.from_sentence: Collaborated with the team using Git for version control, ensuring smooth code integration and project management.
sentences.to_sentence: Collaborated with cross-functional teams using Git and version control best practices, ensuring smooth code integration and delivery of high-quality products.

sentences.from_sentence: Worked on real-time features and optimized app performance, contributing to a scalable and maintainable codebase.
sentences.to_sentence: Debugged and troubleshot issues across web and mobile applications, contributing to scalable, maintainable, and high-performance codebases.
